name: Bean Monopolist Simulator (Real)
description:
Buy beans to get more beans. Sell beans for more than you bought them. Careful, the more beans you  buy, the higher the price of beans will rise. Make money, buy bean farms, overthrow the bean market and become the ultimate bean capitalist. Bean great, how about you?

Beans beans the magical fruit, the more you eat the more you toot. The more you toot the better you feel, so eat your beans at every meal.

MM beans...
